long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avoid mobile sites when you're on a non-mobile browser. If someone sends a mobile link like https://m.reddit.com/stuff, it will redirect you to https://www.reddit.com/stuff, and avoid you the hassle of dealing with mobile sites.

Uses the new WebExtensions browser extension API, so it's simple, fast, small, and compatible with multiple browsers.

Sometimes mobile users post links, and those links are to mobile versions of sites. Since a lot of sites won't automatically redirect you back to the main site, this add-on does it for you, saving you the hassle.
